name: Scratchy Fx
bio: Hailing from the London massive, Scratchy FX comes with a huge line-up of Drum 'N Base and Jungle tracks for the fans!

name: Raining Zing
bio: Zing is an up and coming artist based in Zimbabwee, here in Ireland to soothe the hearts of the people with her smooth tones.

name: Three Melons
bio: The three melons are a local band debuting in the GÃ©il festival. Their signature off-time swing rock will surely get the crowd jamming through the night!

name: The Book Goobers
bio: Old timers coming in from the US of A, these gentleman will bring the classics such as the best of ZZ Top and Black Sabbath. Be prepared for a night to never forget!

name: Fedora Scores
bio: A mysterious group from Norway, not a lot is known yet but their music will certainly move you.
